com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb

Class PPLB_GraphicsUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLB_GraphicsUtil

  • public class PPLB_GraphicsUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods for drawing related programs of the PPLB emulator. This class is used in PPLB class.

    • Method Detail

      • printLine

        public final void printLine(int x,
                            int y,
                            int width,
                            int height,
                            PPLBDraw mode)
                     throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                            BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to draw a line.
        Parameters:
        x - [in] X-axis coordinate. Range: 0~32000; unit: pixels.
        y - [in] Y-axis coordinate. Range: 0~32000; unit: pixels.
        width - [in] Line width. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixels.
        height - [in] Line length. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixels.
        mode - [in] The drawing mode. Use PPLBDraw enum to set up.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLBDraw

                           int thickness)

                           BarcodePrinterGeneralException

        Parameters:
        x - [in] X-axis coordinate. Range: 0~32000; unit: pixels.
        y - [in] Y-axis coordinate. Range: 0~32000; unit: pixels.
        width - [in] Line width. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixels.
        height - [in] Line length. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixels.
        thickness - [in] Line thickness. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixels.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.

      • storeGraphic

        public final void storeGraphic(java.lang.String filePath,
                               java.lang.String imagename)
                        throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                               BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to following the name and location specified by the user, then store the graphic data to the printer.
        Parameters:
        filePath - [in] The graphic filename to convert or download, either an absolute (recommended) path or a relative path. Data type: Unicode; supported formats: BMP, GIF, EXIG, JPG, PNG and TIFF.
        imagename - [in] The graphic name to save. Range: 1~8 alphanumeric (alphabets or numbers) characters.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error, or read file data failed.

        This function only save the graphic data, and store the content into the printer's storage device. If need to print, please call printStoreGraphic.

        As Flash memory has a limited access lifespan, unless graphic data is to be repeatedly used, it is recommended to store the graphic in DRAM.

        See Also:
        printStoreGraphic(int, int, java.lang.String), PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage)

      • storeGraphic

        public final void storeGraphic(java.lang.String filePath,
                               java.lang.String imagename,
                               int width,
                               int height)
                        throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                               BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to following the name and location specified by the user, then store the graphic data to the printer.
        Parameters:
        filePath - [in] The graphic filename to convert or download, either an absolute (recommended) path or a relative path. Data type: Unicode; supported formats: BMP, GIF, EXIG, JPG, PNG and TIFF.
        imagename - [in] The graphic name to save. Range: 1~8 alphanumeric (alphabets or numbers) characters.
        width - [in] The width of the graphic. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixel.
        height - [in] The length of the graphic. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixel.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error, or read file data failed.

        This function only save the graphic data, and store the content into the printer's storage device. If need to print, please call printStoreGraphic.

        As Flash memory has a limited access lifespan, unless graphic data is to be repeatedly used, it is recommended to store the graphic in DRAM.

        See Also:
        printStoreGraphic(int, int, java.lang.String), PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage)

      • storeGraphic

        public final void storeGraphic(java.awt.Image image,
                               java.lang.String imagename)
                        throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                               BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to following the name and location specified by the user, then store the graphic data to the printer.
        Parameters:
        image - [in] The graphic object to convert or download, it is a java.awt.Image object reference.
        imagename - [in] The graphic name to save. Range: 1~8 alphanumeric (alphabets or numbers) characters.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error, or read file data failed.

        This function only save the graphic data, and store the content into the printer's storage device. If need to print, please call printStoreGraphic.

        As Flash memory has a limited access lifespan, unless graphic data is to be repeatedly used, it is recommended to store the graphic in DRAM.

        See Also:
        printStoreGraphic(int, int, java.lang.String), PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage), java.awt.Image

      • storeGraphic

        public final void storeGraphic(java.awt.Image image,
                               java.lang.String imagename,
                               int width,
                               int height)
                        throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                               BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to following the name and location specified by the user, then store the graphic data to the printer.
        Parameters:
        image - [in] The graphic object to convert or download, it is a java.awt.Image object reference.
        imagename - [in] The graphic name to save. Range: 1~8 alphanumeric (alphabets or numbers) characters.
        width - [in] The width of the graphic. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixel.
        height - [in] The length of the graphic. Range: 1~32000; unit: pixel.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error, or read file data failed.

        This function only save the graphic data, and store the content into the printer's storage device. If need to print, please call printStoreGraphic.

        As Flash memory has a limited access lifespan, unless graphic data is to be repeatedly used, it is recommended to store the graphic in DRAM.

        See Also:
        printStoreGraphic(int, int, java.lang.String), PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage), java.awt.Image

      • printStoreGraphic

        public final void printStoreGraphic(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    java.lang.String imagename)
                             throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                    BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to specify a graphic name stored in the printer and print it.
        Parameters:
        x - [in] X-axis coordinate. Range: 0~32000; unit: pixels.
        y - [in] Y-axis coordinate. Range: 0~32000; unit: pixels.
        imagename - [in] The graphic name to draw. Range: 1~8 alphanumeric (alphabets or numbers) characters.
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage)

      • deleteStoreGraphic

        public final void deleteStoreGraphic(java.lang.String imagename)
                              throws BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException,
                                     BarcodePrinterGeneralException
        This function is used to delete image objects stored in the printer.
        Parameters:
        imagename - [in] The name of the image object to delete. If the "*" string is used, all image objects will be deleted. Range: 1~8 English letters or numbers (alphanumeric) characters or asterisks (asterisk).
        Throws:
        BarcodePrinterIllegalArgumentException - Invalid parameter or parameter is out of the valid range.
        BarcodePrinterGeneralException - General error, byte array operation error.
        See Also:
        PPLB_SetUtil.setStorage(com.argox.sdk.barcodeprinter.emulation.pplb.PPLBStorage)
